-  kAudioSessionMode_GameChat 

Global Variable# kAudioSessionMode_GameChat

iOSiPadOSMac CatalystmacOSvisionOS

```
var kAudioSessionMode_GameChat: Int { get }
```

## [See Also](/documentation/AudioToolbox/kAudioSessionMode_GameChat#see-also)

### [Constants](/documentation/AudioToolbox/kAudioSessionMode_GameChat#Constants)

[`var kAudioSessionMode_Default: Int`](/documentation/audiotoolbox/kaudiosessionmode_default)The default mode; used unless you set a mode with the [`AudioSessionSetProperty(_:_:_:)`](/documentation/audiotoolbox/audiosessionsetproperty(_:_:_:)) function.Deprecated[`var kAudioSessionMode_VoiceChat: Int`](/documentation/audiotoolbox/kaudiosessionmode_voicechat)Specify this mode if your app is performing two-way voice communication, such as using Voice over Internet Protocol (VoIP).[`var kAudioSessionMode_VideoRecording: Int`](/documentation/audiotoolbox/kaudiosessionmode_videorecording)Specify this mode if your app is recording a movie.[`var kAudioSessionMode_Measurement: Int`](/documentation/audiotoolbox/kaudiosessionmode_measurement)Specify this mode if your app is performing measurement of incoming audio.
